title: Troop 1941 Activities
note: Edit this file to change the What We Do cards.

items.title: Trail Treks
items.description: Weekend hikes through nearby parks with map-reading practice and Leave No Trace tips.

items.title: Campouts
items.description: Seasonal campouts featuring campfire cooking, shelter building, and night sky navigation.

items.title: Service Projects
items.description: Trail cleanups, food drives, and community events that sharpen leadership and teamwork.

items.title: Skills Lab
items.description: Hands-on badge workshops in first aid, knots, STEM crafts, and safe tool use.
